Cloud Service

All our solutions are available as cloud services

Based on the optimal cloud environment and all the functions required for sales operations

we provide convininet, easy-to-use and highly safe services

Anytime, Anywhere

You can use the service anytime and anywhere as long as you are connected to the Internet.

Low operation costs

Since there is no need to build an asset or system management system in-house, it leads to cost reduction and management load reduction.

Peace of Mind

With security measures and data backup, you can use highly reliable cloud services.

Analytical Sales Management System for the Fashion Industry

Rich Client 3-tier System

The load on the server is distributed by a design optimized for 3 layers. It can demonstrate the response more than the client server type system. Also, rich client systems do not store data on the client PC, so there is no need to worry about information leaks.

Central Management Server

Since the business application can be collectively managed on a server, the system updates also can be done on a server alone. It can be used safely without stopping the system.

Original BI Tool [C.P.A]

Executive level, administrative position, store manager. What they want to see are different for each position. From analysis results to transfer instructions, to order instructions. C.P.A. is a proprietary BI tools included in the package. You can select your favourite analysis axis and call and share it at any time in the cloud, supporting speedy decision making.

Covers Both Wholesale and Retail

There is no need to apply different system for the wholesale and retail and then linkage them. It can be centrally managed by Creative Vision.NET. You will not miss the movement of the product.

Versatility through A Lot of Collaborative Achievements

With the collaboration experience in the fashion industry cultivated since the establishment of the company, it is possible to reduce the cost and development period that are likely to increase. We can flexibly cooperate with ZOZOTOWN, various malls, EC, logistics, etc.

Semi-Automatic Distribution / Replenishment Function

It can be set under a variety of conditions, such as sales order and store rank order. Distribute warehouse inventory evenly to sales standards, avoiding the formation of inaccessible stores and firmly preventing missing items. It is necessary to confirm after giving an instruction, and it is possible to distribute and to order even after confirming and correcting the instruction.
